-2064870927
Problem: ADD
Summary: Add two Numbers
Weight: 250
Time limit: 2 second(s)
Memory limit: 64 MB
Test cases: 2
Description:
Add two numbers, A and B.
Formatting/Constraints:
  • Input:
    1. First line would contain A. A would lie between 0 and 10^9
    2. Second line would contain B. B would lie between 0 and 10^9
  • Output:
    1. Output A+B.
Examples:
  1. Input: 
    1
2
    Output: 
    3
    Analysis:
    Easy...
